summary: Allows you to move your entire family (children & spouse) to any house you want.
descriptionHtml:
This mod gives you the possibility to move your entire family (children & spouse) to any home you want: be it a house from a mod, a house you made yourself or any place of the game. They will have a normal AI (they will do what they always do and the children will still obey you when you tell them to go outside, do their chores, etc.). You can now also move your steward, housecarl and bard to your house if you want to!

How do I move my family once I've installed the mod?
A spell will automatically be given to you. It is of type "power" and called "Move family". You use it like a shout. Once you cast the spell, it will tell you to go to different places of the house so as to let the game know what all the places of your new house correspond to (for instance, you will be asked to go to your children's bed so that your children know where to sleep).

Requires Hearthfires.
Works only if the new home is fully navmeshed.

I give all modders the permission (and even encourage them) to add a link to my mod on their page.



I also made:
- Skyrim Unadoption Mod (compatible with this mod)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47259

But I'm mostly a quest modder. If you're interested, check out:
- The Warpers (Rise of the Witches storyline)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32873
- Cycle of the Silencer
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49713
- A Cure for the Nightmare
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53153
author: VitchRazor AKA WitchRiser

files.name: Custom Family Home
files.changelogHtml:
Version 2.0
- Removed two unnecessary stages
- The spouse will now go in and out of the house randomly (but will still spend more time inside)
- You can now move your steward, housescarl and bard to your new house if you want to.

files.name: Custom Family Home
files.changelogHtml:
Version 2.1
- Fixed the children's sleeping position

files.name: Custom Family Home
files.changelogHtml:
Version 2.2
- Your spouse has now access to all the places of your house
- Your spouse now has a specific eating schedule that matches the one of your children

files.name: Custom Family Home
files.changelogHtml:
Version 2.3
- There shouldn't be any more problems with children not sleeping in their respective beds.
- Boys with toy swords will now attack the dummy in the correct place.
I may also have fixed a possible issue with the spouse saying "you shouldn't be in here" but I can't confirm that for sure because I never had that issue.
